channel.title: Handgun
channel.description:
[img]http://www.uploadz.info/images/1285373968.png[/img]
CC would be nice! If any of you use Blender, it would be cool to get some things recommended to make it look more realistic. :)

item.title: Handgun
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:7, topic:361657”]The actual model is fucking terrible, use reference images next time.[/quote]I’m switching to 3DS MAX, so I might improve with the new tools.

item.title: Handgun
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:5, topic:361657”]Blender is capable of photorealism.

Too smooth for me, but it’s still too blocky as well… Shader is weird. Bullets too big. Compared to the floor texture everything else is very fucking small.[/quote]Ok, thanks, I updated the picture. I’m new to this hole rendering deal, can you give me some tips on a good rendering program/settings for blender that I can use with Macintosh?

Read full topic

item.title: Handgun
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Blender is capable of photorealism.

Too smooth for me, but it’s still too blocky as well… Shader is weird. Bullets too big. Compared to the floor texture everything else is very fucking small.

Read full topic

item.title: Handgun
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:3, topic:361657”]Bullets are too big for the barrel.[/quote]Yea, can be fixed in 2 seconds, it’s just that the fix isn’t worth re-uploading. For now imagine that they would fit in the barrel.

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:2, topic:361657”]If you want realism I wouldn’t use blender, but this is looking a lot better than the version you posted in the models section, did you update it?[/quote]I might move on to maya, but right now i don’t feel like going through the hole torrent mess. And yea I did.

Read full topic
